effect.sun-moon: Raises the target’s Attack by two stages, then confuses it. If the target’s Attack cannot be raised by two stages, the confusion is not applied.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Raises the target’s Attack by two stages, then confuses it. If the target’s Attack cannot be raised by two stages, the confusion is not applied.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Raises the target’s Attack by two stages, then confuses it. If the target’s Attack cannot be raised by two stages, the confusion is not applied.

short_effect.sun-moon: Raises the target’s Attack by two stages and confuses the target.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Raises the target’s Attack by two stages and confuses the target.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Raises the target’s Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.
